newsitem.title: USA: Everest merges into Guardian International.
newsitem.headline: Everest merges into Guardian International.

text.p: Everest Security Systems Corp said on Friday it would merge with Hollywood, Fla.-based Guardian International Inc, and Guardian management will take control of the surviving company.
The company will change its name to Guardian International Inc after the merger, which needs final approval from Guardian's lending institution.
Everest has bought 100 percent of Guardian and will invest an additional $10 million within 60 days of the closing. Other terms were not disclosed.
Guardian is a supplier of security monitoring and monitored security systems in the southeast United States.
